message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $120 by myself. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you, considering your needs are worth $100 to you. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $110. This is an excellent chance to secure a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
